text:
Two persons were killed and 15 others suffered injuries when an omni bus overturned after hitting a crane near Paramathi Velur in the early hours of Saturday.

The omni bus was proceeding to Madurai from Bengaluru. When proceeding near Mohanur Pirivu, the omni bus attempted to overtake a crane moving ahead, when it hit the crane and later capsized. Arul alias Palanisamy (28), of Silvarpatti in Dindigul district, and Rajkumar (42), of Kolathur near Mettur, an occupant of the crane, were killed in the incident. Fifteen persons travelling in the bus suffered injuries and were admitted to the Government Hospital in Paramathi Velur and also in a private hospital in Namakkal town.
title: Two killed in accident
